Replying to @felipeleusin 2018-01-17 22:42
@whymclovin @Netlify If you mean rendering views on the server at request time, then no. We believe strongly in the power of the #JAMstack and removing that complexity. Powerful automation and reduced friction for timely *pre-rendering at build time* (not req) time is where our power comes from.
